column4: any ideas as to why the repositories IP is sometimes resolved as 1.0.0.0 and obviously wont update/install, but other times it resolves their correct IP address and installs a package fine?
j0sh0 hrrm sounds like dns server being silly ?
hrrm well i can give you access to another nameserver to test with if you like... or you can try to point to isp-nameserver....
